song.englishname: The Battle Belongs to the Lord

english.segment1: In heavenly armour we'll enter the land. The battle belongs to the Lord. No weapon that's fashioned against us shall stand. The battle belongs to the Lord
english.segment2: We sing glory and honor. Power and strength to the Lord. (repeat)
english.segment3: The power of darkness comes in like a flood. The battle belongs to the Lord. He's raised up a standard, the power of His blood. The battle belongs to the Lord
english.segment4: When your enemy presses in hard do not fear. The battle belongs to the Lord. Take courage my friend, your redemption is near. The battle belongs to the Lord
